parameters.query:
SELECT 
  pu.*,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ls.id) as total_sessions,
  AVG(ls.final_score) as avg_score,
  COUNT(DISTINCT rpe.id) as total_rpe_events,
  AVG(rpe.rpe_value) as avg_rpe,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sr.id) as total_flashcards
FROM polymath_users pu
LEFT JOIN learning_sessions ls ON ls.user_id = pu.id
LEFT JOIN rpe_events rpe ON rpe.user_id = pu.id
LEFT JOIN spaced_repetition_items sr ON sr.user_id = pu.id
WHERE pu.id = $1
GROUP BY pu.id
